title.rendered: How are Brands using Artificial Intelligence | Infographic

content.rendered:
The speed at which the world is getting mobile knows no limits. Technology drives every company, whether it is a small or big enterprise in every domain. As we know, AI  is one of the biggest components of the wide spectrum of emerging technologies surrounding us.

Companies are adapting to the changing technologies, the users are the first ones to get the effect of that change. The benefits AI provides, to both users and app development companies is commendable.

  • Firstly, it enhances the productivity of the enterprise by releasing them from doing repetitive tasks. All those tasks can be handled by bots developed by the brand.
  • Secondly, there is always an issue that customers face where they have to wait for long before receiving a response to their queries from the company. Well, there is only a limited number of queries that the delegated executive can answer at a time! Artificial Intelligence solves this problem as it provides instant responses to the customers through virtual assistants.

There are many other ways through which Artificial Intelligence is coming up with solutions for enterprises, which in turn is helping them succeed more! This is the main reason why so many giant companies are already focusing on AI.

Performing intricate tasks like answering to repetitive queries by customers can be very time consuming for an organization. Chatbots or virtual assistants that are a part of Artificial Intelligence make it very easy for a brand to complete those tasks.

Brands like Apple, Starbucks, Google, Netflix, Amazon are consuming AI to their benefit like never before, and are seeing a significant rise in their number of users.

In this infographic blog, you can find how are brands using Artificial Intelligence!
